mapper.select: SELECT ry.c_name name, count(xf.c_id) cou from purchase xf left join personnel ry on xf.c_personnelId = ry.c_id GROUP BY ry.c_name
select ifnull(sum(c_money),0) from purchase where t_date BETWEEN #{year} and #{tomYear}
select ifnull(sum(xf.c_hymoney)-sum(sp.f_cost),0) from purchase xf,goods sp where xf.c_goodsId = sp.c_id and t_date BETWEEN #{year} and #{tomYear}
select ifnull(sum(c_hymoney),0) from purchase where c_goodsId is null and t_date BETWEEN #{year} and #{tomYear}
